creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
lenya uses its own requestParamAction which adds server port and other fields 
to the list of returned data (compared to the regular cocoon 
requestParamAction).

this is confusing, and our requestParamAction should therefore either be 
renamed or its functionality submitted to cocoon, as appropriate
i'd rather fix XPS first. punted to 1.4 as it is not critical.
creator: gregor@apache.org
gregor@apache.org
text: as a. kuckartz pointed out, these bugs need to stay on the radar. reopened
has been removed from lenya cvs
creator: gregor@apache.org
